title: Google unveils advanced audio summaries for premium workspace users

title: Space domain awareness, autonomous satellites, data centres in orbit - AI opens up brave new world
description: India is embracing artificial intelligence for space. AI helps track space debris, preventing collisions with satellites. Companies are using AI for Earth observation, analyzing vast imagery data. Autonomous satellite operations are becoming a reality. AI is also enhancing geospatial readiness and satellite communications. This technology is shaping India's growing space economy.

title: Lawmakers, therapists sound the alarm on AI therapists
description: A new bill at the state house would ban therapy delivered by artificial intelligence.
content:
CHARLESTON, S.C. (WCSC) — A new bill at the state house would ban therapy delivered by artificial intelligence.
A quick search of the internet and you can find dozens of AI chatbots, advertising themselves as free resources to help cope with everythi... [4669 chars]

title: India tech convergence to advance democratic AI leadership
description: US-India Business Council (USIBC) President Ambassador Atul Keshap has authored a new blog titled 'Advancing Sound AI Leadership Through US-India Ties,' underscoring the importance of deeper technological collaboration between the United States and India to ensure responsible and democratic leadership in artificial intelligence (AI).

title: in on AI: what TikTok creator ByteDance did next
description: ByteDance, the Beijing-based owner of TikTok, is shifting strongly into artificial intelligence after years of legal and privacy scrutiny. Its chatbot Doubao, launched in 2023, has become China’s most popular AI assistant with over 100 million daily users, rivalling services from OpenAI and Google. New tools like Seedance 2.0 are boosting its global profile, though overseas challenges remain.
content:

description: US News: Anthropic’s artificial intelligence model Claude was used in the US military operation that captured former Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, The W.

title: AI was proof of American exceptionalism. Now it’s undermining it.
description: Artificial intelligence was supposed to entrench U.S. dominance in the knowledge economy. Instead, investors are questioning whether knowledge itself is losing its value.
content: There are many aspects of the recent selloff that are concerning, with anything tangentially threatened by AI getting hit hard. Perhaps the most worrisome, however, is the fact that virtually no knowledge-based company appears to be safe. Software st... [2228 chars]

title: Elon Musk’s xAI faces second lawsuit over toxic pollutants from datacenter
description: NAACP alleges artificial intelligence firm is violating Clean Air Act and polluting Black communities in Mississippi
content:
Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company xAI is facing a second lawsuit alleging it is illegally emitting toxic pollutants from its enormous datacenters, which house its supercomputers and run the chatbot Grok.
